DOC.brief_summary: The study hypothesis is that regional anesthesia offers better outcome for the patients who underwent robot assisted laparoscopic urogenital surgery.
DOC.brief_title: Influence of Anesthesia Technique on Postoperative Evolution After Urogenital Surgical Interventions
DOC.detailed_description: The study investigates the effect of combined anesthesia on occurrence of acute kidney injury in robot assisted laparoscopic urogenital surgery.Renal function is assessed according to the new RIFLE and AKIN criteria, and by determining serum and urinary neutrophil gelatinase associated lipocalin.
DOC.criteria: signed the informed consent without previous renal function alteration respiratory and hemodynamic stability refuse to sign the informed consent chronic or and stage renal disease severe systemic diseases
